text: FC Vahonobudivnyk Kremenchuk is a Ukrainian football club from Kremenchuk. It is a factory team of the Kryukiv Railway Car Building Works based at the right-bank neighborhood of Kremenchuk. Previously the team (club) was known as Dzerzhynets and Avanhard. ==League and cup history== :{|class="wikitable" |-bgcolor="#efefef" ! Season ! Div. ! Pos. ! Pl. ! W ! D ! L ! GS ! GA ! P !Domestic Cup !colspan=2|Europe !Notes |} ==Honours== * Poltava OblastYuriy Korzachenko. Chasing the "Lokomotyv" (Навздогін за «Локомотивом»). Ukrainian Association of Football. 23 July 2010 ** Winners (4): 1948, 1952, 1955, 1965, 1970 ==References== Category:Football clubs in Kremenchuk Category:Defunct football clubs in Ukraine
title: FC Vahonobudivnyk Kremenchuk
